name: BLOOMINGDALE'S BY MAIL LTD. v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, and Eileen H. McNulty, as Acting Secretary of Revenue, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Revenue, Appellants
name_abbreviation: Bloomingdale's by Mail Ltd. v. Commonwealth

judges: NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
FLAHERTY and CAPPY, JJ., dissent and would dismiss the appeal as moot.
parties: BLOOMINGDALE’S BY MAIL LTD. v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, and Eileen H. McNulty, as Acting Secretary of Revenue, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Revenue, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
FLAHERTY and CAPPY, JJ., dissent and would dismiss the appeal as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
591 A.2d 1047
BLOOMINGDALE’S BY MAIL LTD. v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, and Eileen H. McNulty, as Acting Secretary of Revenue, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Revenue, Appellants.

Decided June 4, 1991.
